des: "This popover pie using curry and ham is perfect for breakfast, lunch, or supper. So quick and easy to prepare.  It's attractive and tastes good, too.  Top each serving with a dollop of yogurt and chutney."
ins:
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
Lay the ham, green pepper and onion in the bottom of a shallow greased baking pan. Whisk the milk, flour, eggs and curry together until smooth.
Pour milk mixture over the ham mixture. Bake for 35-40 minutes or till puffed, crisp, and nicely browned.
